text: Institute of High Pressure Physics, also known as Unipress (Polish: Instytut Wysokich Ciśnień Polskiej Akademii Nauk) is a scientific institute founded in 1972 by the Polish Academy of Sciences (PAN). ==The main fields of activity== * Biological materials * Food preservation * High-pressure instrumentation * Nanocrystalline materials * Optoelectronics * Semiconductors * Superconductors ==Notable people== * Sylwester Porowski ==References== ==External links== * Category:1972 establishments in Poland Category:Polish Academy of Sciences Category:Organizations established in 1972
title: Institute of High Pressure Physics
